This fix (2016/10/25) is based on code base of V 11.16,
which fix problem of running from TeXWord 
command lines longer then 512 bytes.

This pack includes BIN\Win32\TeXWord.exe and BIN\Win64\TeXWord.exe

It work only with version 11.16 (IT IS INCOMPATIBLE WITH PREVIOUS VERSIONS !!!)

To apply the fix just unpack 
http://www.bakoma-tex.com/dist/x1116/fix/texword-fix161025.zip 
in BaKoMa TeX folder. 

Check that the files 
BIN\Win32\TeXWord.exe and BIN\Win64\TeXWord.exe
have been replaced. 

NOTE: This fix will be included into next versions.
